meanings.definition: A person or thing that does something well or efficiently.
meanings.sent1: The doozers in the factory work quickly and effectively.
meanings.sent2: She is a doozers when it comes to solving puzzles.
meanings.sent3: The doozers in the kitchen whipped up a delicious meal in no time.
meanings.sent4: His car was a doozers on the racetrack, zooming past all the others.
meanings.sent5: The doozers in the garden made the flowers bloom beautifully.

meanings.definition: A group of small, industrious creatures in the television show Fraggle Rock.
meanings.sent1: The doozers in Fraggle Rock are always busy building structures.
meanings.sent2: Children love watching the doozers on TV as they construct amazing things.
meanings.sent3: The doozers threw a surprise party for the Fraggles in the show.
meanings.sent4: The doozers' teamwork is like a well-oiled machine in Fraggle Rock.
meanings.sent5: The doozers' tiny tools are essential for their construction projects.
